PersonTraining.name: PersonTraining
PersonTraining.description: Represents an assignment of a learning module in Workforce Engagement.

AssigneeId.description: A valid user ID for the user who’s assigned the training. AssigneeId can’t be empty if the Status field is Assigned. We recommend that you set AssigneeId to the value in OwnerId.

Name.description: The name of the learning module.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the person training.

TrainingId.description: The ID of the learning module.
